actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend the period of daylight savings time in each year by one week.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend the ending of daylight savings time each year to the first Sunday in November (previously the last Sunday in October).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to extend the period of daylight savings time in each year by one week.
